about_the_game:
Welcome to the demo of 'The Neverending Check-In: The Hotel Stories', an enchanting 2D pixel RPG filled with adventure and mystery. Get a taste of a mesmerizing hotel where every check-in reveals a new piece of its captivating history.

In this sampler of the full game, you'll start your mission—the renovation of a once-glorious hotel. Delve into the beginnings of an immersive story filled with quests, enigmas, and trials that test your determination.

Meet a vibrant cast of characters, from the quirky hotel staff to the fascinating guests, each with a unique backstory. Start forming impactful relationships and unearthing secrets that will change both you and the hotel's future.

Experience a snippet of our thrilling quests, filled with adventure, humor, and heartwarming stories. Solve puzzles and navigate through intricate passageways as you start uncovering the narratives hidden within the hotel's walls.

Enjoy our clever humor laced with a dash of sarcasm, along with witty nods to familiar universes that add a layer of excitement and nostalgia to your journey. Each step you take brings you closer to understanding the hotel's rich history and the secrets it conceals.

Immerse yourself in our lovingly crafted pixel art and see how you can bring life back into the hotel's enchanting corners, even in this demo version.

And yes, there are cats. Even in this short demo, you'll start discovering the secret lives of feline companions and the unexpected roles they play.

Ready for a sample of a quest that will challenge your mind, touch your heart, and set the stage for the full glory of 'The Neverending Check-In: The Hotel Stories'?

The story begins here. Your demo experience awaits.
